description: Demolition and partial reconstruction of Turnmill Street wall and construction of a new station interchange behind, to link with London Underground, Thameslink and Crossrail.  Also listed building consent reference P081484 submitted
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: A detailed lighting scheme shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and installed prior to the use of the building. The details shall include the location and full specification of all lamps; light levels/spill.

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON:  To ensure that the any resulting general or security lighting are appropriately located, designed do not adversely impact neighbouring residential amenity and are appropriate to the overall design of the building in accordance with policies: D1; D3; D4; Env12;  Env17 of the Islington UDP and policies 4B.1; 4B.2; and 4B.6  of the London Plan 2008.
